main: ^Hello sir. I need to see your licence to forage in these parts sir.
^Hi Officer, I wasn’t aware that I needed a licence…
^Ahh well you know sir, no licence means a 5000 Rand fine.
^Oh gosh, I just washed up here a couple days ago. I definitely don’t have that kind of money.
^Well then I have to confiscate everything you have foraged.
^Oh no, Ouma will be so upset with me.
^Ah but you know, my friend, something smells very nice in that shell back there.
^I just made fresh potjie kos. But I don't see what that has to do wi-
^My friend, I have been on this beach working all day. I am very very hungry. Maybe there is something else you want to give me instead of all your foragings?
^Are you asking for a bribe? I don't think that is very ethical-
^No! No bride sir. I am just making conversation here.
^Oh…well I am happy to give you this Potjie if you are hungry. It’s good practice for me to make another one.
^Ahh, my friend, that is very kind of you. I think I will just be on my way.
^Um…okay. Thank you officer. Have a nice day!
^Potjie Kos is removed from your inventory.
